channel.title: Paradise PK 317 V2 --VPS!--
channel.description:
Hey guys! Just got V2 up and running! Hope to see you in the game!
Forum: http://paradisersps.createaforum.com/index.php
Download Client: http://uppit.com/xwhmhuwotk6d/Paradise.rar https://www.dropbox.com/s/22myfv0ebixivz8/Paradise.rar
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]
-Trivia -Random -Pk Points Store -Player Shops at home -Reasonable prices, build on a good economy -Personal Shop feature for the Afk Seller -All skills but farming -Custom Pk Skill -Mystery boxes, -Combat lamp (get all 99s in one click) -Custom donator zone -18+ bosses -Working God Wars -Duel Arena 100% working -Torva, Pernix, Virtus, Vesta, Statius, Morrigan, Korasi -Good barrows minigame -Firepits working 100% -Jad fully made
[u][b]Owners Note:[/b][/u] Im Gonna need some staff soon so become a dedicated player and you may get randomly nominated to become an admin or mod!
[u][i][b]Current Staff:[/b][/i][/u]
[b]Owner: [/b] Anthony
[b]Coder&Developer: [/b] Anthony
[b]Admins:[/b] Garp
[b]Mods:[/b] Aciidvenom
[u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u]
[b]Home:[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/214t5i0.png[/img] [b]God Wars Tele:[/b] [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/9228/pxt9.png[/img] [b]Boss Teles:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IJcGqDG.png[/img] [b]Monster Teles:[/b] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/5787/hmob.png[/img] [b]Pking Teles:[/b] [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/9860/hgr3.png[/img] [b]Barrows:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XhX7n8C.png[/img] [b]Pest Control:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VOSWWFG.png[/img]
